# This is the maximum allowed number of cores that the miner can utilize.
# The default value is 1. The maxmimum is 6. If you choose to use more than
# the recommended number of cores, your computer stands the risk of a thermal

# shutdown or, more  dangerously, damage by overheating. You have been warned.
# I, Trystan Cannon, bare no responsibility for your actions.
coreLimit=1
